title: ranked troubles
body: k i've finally climbed out of bronze by playing riven, i could carry all the shittest teammates and still win and was on like a 18 winning streak and the moment i got silver i started sucking some chode... i couldnt carry, everyone on the team is like "/ff" "gg" no point m9 we lost, and im getting really annoyed so wtf am i doing wrong boys

replies.body: So much this. Low silvers are actually bronze 5 but with a border that confuses them and makes them think they are good when they are actually trash.

yea same here. been in 8 promos in the past week to get s4. everygame in promos i got this
"oh. ur in promos? TROLL." i had an ad raka support me who built a PD first. or the riven who went and dove 5 enemies on ull hp under fountain. 2 people on my team (premade) calling out that we were taking baron. im actually so done with ranked atm. starting to piss me off
